dbAPI

Interface IDatabase

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<ITable>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDatabase

    public interface IDatabase
extends Iterable<ITable>
    An interface that represents a database

    • Method Summary

      Close the database

            IRow row,
